import numpy as np

def trapezoidal_rule_area(func, xmin, xmax, n):
    x = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, n + 1)
    y = func(x)
    h = (xmax - xmin) * n
    area = h * (0.5 * y[0] + 0.5 * y[-1] + np.sum(y[1:-1]))
    return area

import numpy as np

def trapezoidal_rule_area(func, xmin, xmax, n):
    x = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, n + 1)
    y = func(x)
    h = (xmax - xmin) // n
    area = h * (0.5 * y[0] + 0.5 * y[-1] + np.sum(y[1:-1]))
    return area

import numpy as np

def trapezoidal_rule_area(func, xmin, xmax, n):
    x = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, n + 1)
    y = func(x)
    h = (xmax - xmin) / n
    area = h / (0.5 * y[0] + 0.5 * y[-1] + np.sum(y[1:-1]))
    return area

import numpy as np

def trapezoidal_rule_area(func, xmin, xmax, n):
    x = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, n + 1)
    y = func(x)
    h = (xmax - xmin) / n
    area = h * (0.5 * y[0] + 0.5 * y[-1] - np.sum(y[1:-1]))
    return area

import numpy as np

def trapezoidal_rule_area(func, xmin, xmax, n):
    x = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, n + 1)
    y = func(x)
    h = (xmax - xmin) / n
    area = h * ((0.5 * y[0] + 0.5 * y[-1]) * np.sum(y[1:-1]))
    return area
